title: runtime: test fails on linux/arm
body:
I built Go 1.5.3 from source on Linux/Arm (Raspberry Pi 2, Debian Jessie). All tests pass except one, both when run through `all.bash` and when run standalone after installation. Below is the standalone result.

I thought this might be in the same vein as #11959, which was fixed, but oddly enough I can't find the referenced commit that purportedly fixed it in the commit history of the go1.5.3 tag.
